component.name: Piwik Analytics
component.description: Piwik displays reports regarding the geographic location of visits, the source of visits (i.e. whether they came from a website, directly, or something else), the technical capabilities of visitors (browser, screen size, operating system, etc.), what the visitors did (pages they viewed, actions they took, how they left), the time of visits and more. Provides simple Piwik Analytics integration into Core Plus.

config.description: Set to the hostname of your Piwik server
So if one visitor visits x.corepl.us and y.corepl.us, they will be counted as a unique visitor.
if someone visits the 'About' page on blog.corepl.us it will be recorded as 'blog / About'. This is the easiest way to get an overview of your traffic by sub-domain.
